subject: Mathematics
question_text: In a survey of 220 students of a higher secondary school, it was found that at least 125 and at most 130 students studied Mathematics; at least 85 and at most 95 studied Physics; at least 75 and at most 90 studied the most number of students who studied all the three subjects. Then is equal to ______

options.text: and  respectively be the least and
both Mathematics and Physics and 10 studied none of these subjects. Let
